guild.description:
A guild dedicated to Minecraft! All are welcome to discuss the game, news, servers, etc.

---

Rules:

**⛏️ Minecraft-related only.** This a community dedicated to Minecraft.

**📬 No spamming.** Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

**🏛️ No politics.** There’s a time and place for those complex topics. Not here please.

**😀 Be civil. Be nice.** Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

**📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS.** This is a given.

---

+RuqqusFactions

+RuqqusCraft

+RuqqusMC

body: I'm sorry. I was just discussing that with @WinterSoldier. I've been trying to tell Cap about the downvote brigades -- everyone has -- and I'm super fed up with it all. Ruqqus is going to start losing money if the people who aren't here to say the Gamer word keep getting downvoted to hell when they try to post 'normal' stuff. :/
body_html: I'm sorry. I was just discussing that with @WinterSoldier. I've been trying to tell Cap about the downvote brigades -- everyone has -- and I'm super fed up with it all. Ruqqus is going to start losing money if the people who aren't here to say the Gamer word keep getting downvoted to hell when they try to post 'normal' stuff. :/

body:
Yeah, it doesn't look like this post or the arctic fox gif will recover from it. The votes aren't supposed to count coming from the same person, but they could easily get around being tracked, or they haven't fixed the bug yet that makes them count anyway.

Fortunately, this is the worst I've dealt with it so far.
body_html:
Yeah, it doesn't look like this post or the arctic fox gif will recover from it. The votes aren't supposed to count coming from the same person, but they could easily get around being tracked, or they haven't fixed the bug yet that makes them count anyway.

Fortunately, this is the worst I've dealt with it so far.

body:
https://ruqqus.com/post/1rbp/there-are-no-brigades--guild

Happens to me all the time, and I'm starting to wonder why I donate to the site. It's not like I'm banned from Reddit-- I'm here because I **want** to be and this is feeling like some bullshit.
body_html:
https://ruqqus.com/post/1rbp/there-are-no-brigades--guild

Happens to me all the time, and I'm starting to wonder why I donate to the site. It's not like I'm banned from Reddit-- I'm here because I want to be and this is feeling like some bullshit.

body: I don't think it's the devs' fault. They actually have a system set up to track multiple accounts coming from the same user and not count them.
body_html: I don't think it's the devs' fault. They actually have a system set up to track multiple accounts coming from the same user and not count them.
